tweets.text: @MrMarkwarren1 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @DrMickSalt @EnvAgency had to buy one of those sort of silver foil loft covers with a zip for the loft hatch as it was seeping through anywhere it could find. This house is literally sealed up like nobody‚Äôs business and it still manages to come through. Not as much as before it‚Äôs very light but still

@SianieRoo @DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency From my experience 100%, even the loft where it was dark built up the hydrogen sulphide and outside would be clear, my view would be for the authorities to reassess the implications of this!
@LivOnShoestring @misshootershill @Royal_Greenwich @AlanBarrierEA @visitlondon @EnvAgency @TfL Lovely photos
@LivOnShoestring @AlanBarrierEA @Royal_Greenwich @visitlondon @EnvAgency @TfL Lovely set of photographs

Y'day, @metecoban92, @chrismylesk & I wrote to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea & associated waterways. It builds on letter @jonburkeUK & I sent before.
It's unacceptable residents, wildlife & visitors have to put up with this.
Thanks to those who got in touch. https://t.co/cISAOKNhoP
@MarkCDavies1 @EnvAgency @LancasterCC @VolkerStevinUK Is there no footpath?

urls.title: Make your Easter Plastic Free! - Preventing Plastic Pollution

tweets.text:
Happy Easter from all of us at Preventing Plastic Pollution. Thanks to @EnvAgency for this lovely poster! Here are a few simple things you can do this bank holiday weekend to help us tackle plastic pollution: https://t.co/nOhTvzaOoO 

üá¨üáßüê£#plasticfree #getcreative üê£üá™üá∫ https://t.co/AOfIzW3ojV

domain.name: Holiday
domain.description: Holidays like Christmas or Halloween

tweets.text: Important thread from @julian_kirby on the damaging pollution impacting on River Lea & how we must work together to tackle it now & in the future. The @EnvAgency must do more & Govt must start reinvesting in it in the Spending Review if they're to be taken seriously at @COP26 üëá https://t.co/kmGbKbY5J7

Could we be doing more to build a world that values, rather than suppresses, differences?

The @EnvAgency's @AyoSokale, highlights that we say we want #diversity, when in fact we create all systems for a fictional ‚Äònormal‚Äô person.

üëâhttps://t.co/s1Wg8787Sa

#AutismAwarenessDay

This letter üëáis v welcome, thanks @mayorofhackney & also @colin_gram @HMUG_Hackney @DobbyWoods @plasticfreehkny & all who've helped bring attention to #plasticpollution #sewage on the #riverlea. We look forward to an effective response from @EnvAgency 1/9 https://t.co/adszfR3hl7

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo As I am sure Sian‚Äôs solicitors would agree it wouldn‚Äôt be wise to talk about legal actions being considered. That would be a gift for for those in frame! Needless to say the ¬£50k is being used üëç https://t.co/pH1E6LKkLx I think we are further advance than Belfast.

@WildHorizons_ @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency I know. Been saying this for a year. Through covid there's been a Iack of scrutiny on the ground from agencies who said they can't visit sites etc so we had to become reporters, filmmakers.. doing work that we shouldn't have to..that's the insanity of this last 12 months

tweets.text: @Penmcgregor We shouldn't be policing #HS2 Penny. They were granted a social licence to build this rail but it's obvious now that it was based on empty promises. @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency  should be keeping them in check yet they are sanctioning the destruction. Time to have our say!

@PhilipGlanville @metecoban92 @chrismylesk @EnvAgency @jonburkeUK We hope that @StellaCreasy @DavidLammy @KateOsamor join you too we‚Äôve written to them re the impact of #sewage pollution on our local @IUCNRedList #eels, critically endangered, #watervole, & BAP kingfisher et al & importance of #CleanWater & #HealthyRivers for #ClimateResilience

urls.title: ITV Central News: 'Crisis' in the water as river phosphate levels threaten wildlife on the Wye
urls.description: ITV Central News: 'Crisis' in the water as soaring river phosphate levels threaten wildlife on the Wye

tweets.text:
Irresistible.
Newly tarmacced cycle track and river defence.
Superb job @EnvAgency @LancasterCC @VolkerStevinUK https://t.co/cSPFBVWXI6

Listen to the local children talk about how the landfill effects them.

https://t.co/Z20ED51IO4

How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/5XocwdLO82

tweets.text: @SYFR crews and officers are still working hard to extinguish a large fire in Sheffield. Thanks to support from @syptweet @SheffCouncil @EnvAgency @PHE_YorksHumber it‚Äôs been a real team effort so far. We could be there a number of daysüöí https://t.co/lt39zEOn8a

Together with Mayor @PhilipGlanville and Cllr @ChrisMylesK, we wrote a letter to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea. 

It‚Äôs unacceptable and we deserve better. Thank you to all of you who got in touch. https://t.co/FuIJDv5kz0

Define 'small and short-term' when it comes to people's health! This is not a new problem. I can only assume Dr Richard Harling does not live in Silverdale/immediate vicinity. All this stinks of corporate greed put above the health of local residents! https://t.co/OuLTZkrsSq

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids What effect are these gasses having on workers here? What are the @healthandsafety regs? Are the daily exposure limits being exceeded? Perhaps this is a way forward, it is a criminal offence under the Health&safetyAtWorkAct to endanger life in the workplace. @RedIndustries2

I‚Äôm still in shock at the levels we‚Äôve been subjected to. And that wasn‚Äôt the worst week...the worst was where they forgot to turn the monitor on! @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/DzgfHQUHse

Bearing in mind that the 30-minute peak in the previous monitoring exercise was 44.5, it‚Äôs clear my constituents are being subjected to a major and ongoing environmental incident.

I trust the culprits will be properly held accountable by @EnvAgencyMids.

We‚Äôve previously raised concerns about this landfill. Thread here: https://t.co/uTIGsB8hwV 

Very pleased that @belfastcc are taking action. https://t.co/JW7QKdNKqk

This ITV report is as shocking as yesterday‚Äôs news from the @EnvAgency . This is the death of an iconic river in slow motion - largely due to unmitigated agricultural pollution. The intensive poultry industry needs to clean itself up ASAP for starters @thenoblefoods https://t.co/d1pmbc1Fug

We‚Äôre at the end of the peatland restoration season. Recently we have been working to improve water quality and biodiversity on Shap Fells in Cumbria - here's our team in action
 @cumbriawildlife @unitedutilities @EnvAgency https://t.co/GSxdN7fZCY
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency We'll show them a community spirit tomorrow mate.

urls.title: Navigate to: Staffordshire County Council Home Page
urls.description: Staffordshire County Council's Director of Care and Health has spoken on the possibility of health issues connected to odours in the west of Newcastle and further afield.

tweets.text: 'We understand people's concerns' - @StaffordshireCC Director of Care and Health speaks about odours in west Newcastle and further afield   https://t.co/GLJNln8sQm  @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @PHE_WestMids https://t.co/OZBQMhEJM1

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Temporarily, yes, on average, no. Indoors creates an overall protection factor, but in temporary circumstances, it can act as a reservoir if the outside concentration drops suddenly.

Enjoy making memories in the outdoors. You‚Äôll be doing your bit for nature, by leaving wildlife as you find it. 

Have a quick read of the refreshed #CountrysideCode @NaturalEngland
 
https://t.co/Kewd6CpXTC
 
#RespectProtectEnjoy

tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @MissyDoom @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL , I am truly aghast. I was certain that the odour nuisance guideline would be exceeded, but to hear that the health-based guidance is exceeded is truly astonishing. To think the residents of Newcastle were vilified for daring to complain, yet science backs them.

@jackvalentine_1 @RiversReturn @CityofTreesMcr @GroundworkGM @OldhamCouncil @EnvAgency @moorsforfuture @natural_course @GMGreenCity @CaBAtweets Yep there was Jack,. Think that‚Äôs where we first met in the  Blue Bell üëç

This is a very good point. When the gas comes overnight it becomes trapped in the home & we breathe it in all night. It‚Äôs still outside in the morning so can‚Äôt release it. Could our homes have higher levels of hydrogen sulphide than outside @DrMickSalt ? @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/eRjR7yZnmt

Part of the problem is also people throwing and dumping all kinds of litter from and next to bridges. These are a  few recent pics taken along the Silkstream at bridges at Colindale Ave. ,Colindeep lane, the bridge before Watling Ave. & the Silk Bridge(A5) We removed some of it! https://t.co/bpM7mJzIh7 https://t.co/o3oYX3YG9y

@beckers1000 @RiversReturn @CityofTreesMcr @GroundworkGM @OldhamCouncil @EnvAgency @moorsforfuture @natural_course @GMGreenCity @CaBAtweets Me too, used to be a cracking trials section back in the 70's. #ShawMCC
@RiversReturn @CityofTreesMcr @GroundworkGM @OldhamCouncil @EnvAgency @moorsforfuture @natural_course @GMGreenCity @CaBAtweets Yep, see them regularly üòä https://t.co/Y4tun7QhXF

This week is #WorldAutismAwarenessWeek the EA are celebrating this with various activities all week .Approx 1 in 100 people are autistic but only 22% are in employment . @EnvAgencySE @MoretonBack1 @wifo_ea @johncurtinEA @JohnLeylandEA

This is happening even without the impact of EDF Sizewell C's 10+ metres sea wall. No wonder Suffolk residents are alarmed EDF won't disclose design of sea wall & EDF believe it's ok to only protect their own site disregarding impact on neighbours 
@PINSgov @EnvAgency @The_ONR https://t.co/FX6CvLkfu7

@Geraint_Smith @RiverActionUK @rosamundi @EnvAgency @itvnews @thenoblefoods You are absolutely correct - it is a monumental scandal. A hugely important river is just being left to die under unrelenting attack by intensive agriculture - who appear to be able to act with impunity
